About Pizza Pipeline Pizza Pipeline is a Fast Food restaurant located at 10925 N Newport Hwy in Spokane, WA . Pizza Pipeline has been described as an Perfect Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 10 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food, Take Out, Pizza Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
User Reviews for Pizza Pipeline
All Reviews for Pizza Pipeline
Kelly
August 25, 2008
Food
10
Decor
10
Service
10
I am not a huge pizza fan, but I love taco pizza. In Spokane, there is only one place that makes great taco pizza and that is Pizza Pipeline. They also have to die for garlic breadsticks (aka: tricky-stix). Their traditional pizzas leave something to be desired sauce-wise.
Overall Rating
10
"Perfect"
